titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of October 2, 2022, through October 8, 2022, as "Latex Allergy Awareness Week".
Expressing support for designation of the week of October 2, 2022, through October 8, 2022, as "Latex Allergy Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Latex Allergy Awareness Week.
